# Cowin-Slot-Finder-Notifying-Beep
Descrption: This javascript helps to find out the slot once available on Cowin (India Vaccination Scheduler) app. This javascript code get executed in every one minute and notify you using the beep sound once slot is available.

Note: Not a too good solution but can be helpful. This won't automatically book the slot.


1. Go to https://www.cowin.gov.in/home (In a new window/tab)
2. Setup the address where you want to get vaccinated.
3. Select Age 18-44. (As 45+ is easly available)
4. Click Search button once.
5. Open console and paste the below script using inspect element.
6. Once a slot is available, it will give you Beep sound.
7. Right now, it looks for a slot in every 1 Minute. Keep it this way to avoid hitting Cowin API too much.
8. Keep the window/tab opened in a separately.

/***Copy from below to the end****/

function checkSlots() {
    let slots = document.getElementsByClassName('vaccine-box');
    for (let i = 0; i < slots.length; i++) {
        if (!isNaN(slots[i].childNodes[0].innerText) && !isNaN(parseFloat(slots[i].childNodes[0].innerText))) {
            var snd = new Audio("data:audio/wav;base64,");
            snd.play();
            break;
        }
    }
}

setInterval(function () {
    let searchBtn = document.getElementsByClassName('pin-search-btn')[0];
    searchBtn.click();

    setTimeout(function () {
        checkSlots();
    }, 2000);
    
}, 60000);
